description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Burning Rubber is a fast paced retro racing game where the player must fight the other drivers while trying to come 1st place. The game includes 24 different race tracks over 3 difficulty modes, a mix of different weapons and upgrades to buy for your car and random encounters where the player can either win or lose money.
